combobox.name: select_session
combobox.script:
function onValueChanged() sCurValue = getSelectedValue() window.chatlog_list.closeAll() local w = nil local sColor = "" local bLink = false local sText = "" for i, v in ipairs(ChatlogExplorer.tChatLogs) do if ChatlogExplorer.tChatLogs[i][1] == sCurValue then for x, y in ipairs(ChatlogExplorer.tChatLogs[i]) do w = window.chatlog_list.createWindow() sColor, bLink, sText = extractDetails(y) w.chatlog_text.setValue(sText) if bLink then sColor = "FF0000FF" end if sColor == "" then sColor = "FFFFFFFF" end w.chatlog_text.setUnderline(bLink) w.chatlog_text.setColor(sColor) sColor = "" bLink = false sText = "" end end end end
function extractDetails(str) local sColor = "" local sText = "" local sText2 = "" local bLink = false local sURL = "" sColor = string.match(str, '<font color="#+(%w+)') sURL = string.match(str, '<a href="([^>]+)">') if sURL then bLink = true end if bLink then sText = sURL else sText, sText2 = string.match(str, '[^>]+>(.+)</font>(.*)') end if sText then sText = fixhtml(sText..sText2) end return sColor, bLink, sText end
function fixhtml(str) local sFixedString = "" if str then sFixedString = string.gsub(str, ">", ">") sFixedString = string.gsub(sFixedString, "", "\r") sFixedString = string.gsub(sFixedString, "
", "\n") sFixedString = string.gsub(sFixedString, """, '"') sFixedString = string.gsub(sFixedString, "#", "#") sFixedString = string.gsub(sFixedString, "$", "$") sFixedString = string.gsub(sFixedString, "%", "%") sFixedString = string.gsub(sFixedString, "&", "&") sFixedString = string.gsub(sFixedString, "'", "'")
end return sFixedString end

buttoncontrol.name: button_refresh
buttoncontrol.script:
function onClickRelease(button, x, y) window.select_session.clear() ChatlogExplorer.parseChatLogs() for i,v in ipairs(ChatlogExplorer.tChatLogs) do window.select_session.add(ChatlogExplorer.tChatLogs[i][1], ChatlogExplorer.tChatLogs[i][1], false) end
end
